sub_title: Deloitte Global Tax & Legal Leader Talks about #futureoftax #futureoflegal #regulation #digital, #taxation, #leadership,#sustainability, #CFO, and #responsiblebusiness
summary:
My professional life has been driven by making an impact on our clients, our people and on society. I have always been energized by building high-performance teams and developing our talent. And by serving clients in innovating and transforming their businesses. 

As Deloitte Global Tax & Legal Leader, I am responsible for the market leading Tax & Legal practice of 11 billion net revenue and over 56,000 employees. My main responsibilities are growing the practice while securing and enhancing the value of the brand. I previously led Tax & Legal in Deloitte Netherlands for seven years and served in various Dutch leadership roles including Corporate Strategy Officer and CFO Program Leader. I also held several regional leadership roles as well for Deloitte North South Europe (NSE), including serving as a member of the Executive Board. During my 25-year tenure at Deloitte, Iâ€™ve worked with Tax Directors, CFOs, and CEOs of many large multinational companies to advise them in all fields of international corporate tax, with a focus on restructuring, divestments, and tax department organization in the consumer business industry.
